SELECT count(0) FROM `teacher_profile` t,`school_unit` su WHERE t.unit_id=su.id AND t.unit_id IN (SELECT id FROM `school_unit` su WHERE su.school_domain=#{schoolDomain})

select t.id id, t.username name, t.email email, t.avatar avatar, t.degree degree, t.state state, t.views views, t.post post, t.scholat_username scholat_username, t.pinyin pinyin, t.domain_name domainName, t.edit_name editName, date_format(t.update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') update_time, date_format(t.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') create_time, su.domain_name school_unit_domainName, su.unit_name unit_name, su.id unit_id FROM `teacher_profile` t,`school_unit` su WHERE t.unit_id=su.id AND t.unit_id IN (SELECT id FROM `school_unit` su WHERE su.school_domain=#{schoolDomain})
and (t.state=1 or t.state = 2)
and t.state!=1 and t.state != 2
ORDER BY pinyin
ORDER BY update_time
desc
LIMIT #{offSet},#{pageRow}
